Stockholm.name: Gamla Stan
Stockholm.description: Medieval old town with Royal Palace, Nobel Museum, and cobblestone streets

Stockholm.name: Södermalm
Stockholm.description: Trendy island district with vintage shops, cafes, and SoFo neighborhood

Stockholm.name: Östermalm
Stockholm.description: Upscale area with Östermalms Saluhall, Strandvägen, and luxury shopping

Stockholm.name: Kungsholmen
Stockholm.description: Residential island with City Hall, waterfront promenades, and local vibe

Stockholm.name: Djurgården
Stockholm.description: Green island with Vasa Museum, Skansen, Gröna Lund, and royal park

Stockholm.name: Vasastan
Stockholm.description: Elegant neighborhood with Observatory Museum, cafes, and 19th-century architecture

Stockholm.name: Norrmalm
Stockholm.description: Central business district with Drottninggatan shopping and Central Station

Gothenburg.name: Haga
Gothenburg.description: Historic wooden house district with cobblestone streets and cafes

Gothenburg.name: Linné
Gothenburg.description: Trendy area with independent shops, restaurants, and nightlife

Gothenburg.name: Avenyn
Gothenburg.description: Main boulevard with restaurants, theaters, and Poseidon statue
